text: Dakota City is a city in Dakota County, Nebraska, United States. As of the 2020 census, 2,081 people lived there. It is the county seat of Dakota County. == History == Dakota City was platted in 1856. It was named for the Dakota people. Dakota City was incorporated as a city in 1858. == Geography == Dakota City is at (42.415294, -96.417808). The city has a total area of . Of that, is land and is water. == Demographics == Dakota City is part of the Sioux City, IA-NE-SD Metropolitan Statistical Area. === 2020 census === As of the 2020 census, there were 2,081 people, 661 households, and 478 families living in Dakota City. == References == == Other websites == * Dakota City - Official website Category:Cities in Nebraska Category:County seats in Nebraska
title: Dakota City, Nebraska
